coreAttributes.name: battle axe
coreAttributes.description: A huge battle axe, designed specifically for use in combat. Despite its bulky appearance, it's remarkably lightweight, allowing the wielder to efficiently bring its blade, spike, and hook to bear on their target.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] hold of [npc.her] battle axe as [npc.she] [npc.verb(get)] ready to use it in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Swinging [npc.her] battle axe, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to strike [npc2.name] right in the chest; the ethereal arcane blade passing through [npc2.her] torso to drain [npc2.her] energy!
Swinging out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] battle axe, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to slash through [npc2.her] [npc2.arm] with the ethereal blade and drain [npc2.her] energy!

With a quick [npc.step] forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] battle axe, sinking the ethereal blade into [npc2.her] shoulder and causing [npc2.herHim] to lose some energy!
hitDescriptions.criticalHitText: Expertly sidestepping around [npc2.namePos] attempt to block [npc.her] attack, [npc.name] [npc.verb(deal)] a devastating strike with [npc.her] battle axe!

missDescriptions.missText: Swinging [npc.her] battle axe, [npc.name] [npc.verb(attempt)] to stab [npc2.name] in the chest, but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Swinging out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] battle axe, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick [npc.step] forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(lunge)] out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] battle axe, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
